description:
Mistral AI’s latest model, Mistral Large 2 (ML2), allegedly competes with large models from industry leaders like OpenAI, Meta, and Anthropic, despite being a fraction of their sizes. The timing of this release is noteworthy, arriving the same week as Meta’s launch of its behemoth 405-billion-parameter Llama 3.1 model. Both ML2 and Llama 3 boast... Read more »

The post Mistral Large 2: The David to Big Tech’s Goliath(s) appeared first on AI News.
title: Mistral Large 2: The David to Big Tech’s Goliath(s)
